item.title: Automate Hugo Deployment to GitHub Page
item.description: Setting up a blog under your own control might sound tricky, unless you know the secret … Mine is Hugo + GitHub Pages. There are lots of helpful articles available online, a proof that many people have tried it out. Below is a summary of my approach: Set up a repository for the source content. Set up another repository for the GitHub page, which will host your generated website. For these first two steps, you can aslo follow Build a Personal Website With Github Pages and Hugo.
